document.full_text: four anglican priests and 11 church wardens were arrested wednesday for trying to prevent people allied with a supporter of president robert mugabe from taking over the home of a rector in harare.
document.title: zimbabwe: church officials detained
lines_and_colors: four anglican priests and 11 church wardens were arrested wednesday for trying to prevent people allied with a supporter of president robert mugabe from taking over the home of a rector in harare.
